Dealer.java

Field Summary
(package private)  boolean again
           
 
Constructor Summary
Dealer(Player p, int n)
          Constructs the dealer class
 
Method Summary
 void checkBlackjack()
          Checks to see if the player has blackjack before continuing with the game
 void deal()
          Calls for the dealer to deal the first cards of the hand
 void dealDealerNext()
          Adds cards to the dealer's hand until the dealer's hand value is 17 or above
 void dealFirst()
          Deals the player's first card, then the dealer's first card, and finally deals that player's second card
 void dealPlayerNext()
          Deals the player's next cards, asking the player if he or she wants to hit or stand
 void displayHand()
          Displays the first card of the dealer's hand
 void doubleDown()
          Asks the player if he or she would like to double their bet If yes, pot = pot * 2
 Hand getHand()
          Returns the dealer's hand
 void offerInsurance()
          Offers the user insurance if the dealer's first card is an ace, which pays 2:1
 void payout()
          Decides of the player won or lost Also changes the player's bankroll based off of the result of the hand
 void start()
          Starts the game

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
